metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12457 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The bfd_make_section_with_flags function in section.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29 and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause a NULL dereference via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
